articles.description: A black hole has blasted out a surprisingly powerful jet in the distant universe, according to a new study from NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory and discussed
articles.content: A black hole has blasted out a surprisingly powerful jet in the distant universe, according to a new study from NASAs Chandra X-ray Observatory and discussed in our latest press release. This jet exi… [+5912 chars]
